biography_text: FERGUSON, Anderson Drew IV, a Representative from Georgia; born in West Point, Troup County, Ga., November 15, 1967; graduated from Springwood School, Lanett, Ala., 1985; attended University of Georgia, Athens, Ga., 1988; D.M.D., Medical College of Georgia, Augusta, Ga., 1992; dentist; faculty, Medical College of Georgia, Augusta, Ga., 1998-2016; member of the West Point, Ga., board of aldermen, 1997-1999; Mayor of West Point, Ga., 2008-2016; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
